title: Pricing
description: You already have a website for your English speaking customers. How many other cultures would you like to reach?
spread: *Note: Spread (δ) is calculated as a percentage of translation costs. Translation costs operate on a pass through model, so 'Bring Your Own' works both standalone and as part of a workflow.

item.title: Trial: 1 language(s)
item.subTitle: $49/month + δ*
item.description: Ready to explore a new market? Perfect for a pilot, or a business with a small footprint looking to increase awareness.

item.title: Starter: 1+ language(s)
item.subTitle: $399/month + δ*
item.description: Current customers who speak another language? Are they a bigger part of your business these days?

item.title: Professional: 3+ languages
item.subTitle: $999/month + δ*
item.description: Exporter? Looking to cater to Tourists? Proactively reach out to clients from elsewhere.
